channel.title: [PI] Verprex [PI] The place were Hybrids are born. ~
channel.description:
[CENTER]Using Process-Pk as a base.
[CODE] updated all teleports + new spots for each particular teleport added new reset skill interface client + server sided. added new anime so when play gets up from "resting" it stands up first instead of just skipping the standing up part. new skill tab for summoning. added pouch creation added scrolls for summoning added summoning tab option to choose from old or new x10 hit numbers added full screen added items into slayer shop configured slayer system rewrote combat formula added 317 maps removed 508 maps new password interface added 6 more bosses started dung base Started summoning base Re done pkp points system to function properly. Re done voting system to fuction properly. Added levels reset npc Added lock xp Added resting Voting system with callbacks Voting points system Triple Xp week Triple Pkp week Tweaked up prices Re did the forums. Added more categories and forums. uploaded client download. uploaded client cache. Working on homepage css from scratch. Added pkp shop. Fixed a deadlock & null bug. Re done slayer system. Added interface for help in quest tab. Fixed Pvp Dupe 100% Dung in progress Summoning in progress Added whos online command + inerface Added Commands list + interface [/CODE]
New friends + ignore list on the same tab!
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tqEHsae.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/D49aH3o.png[/img]
New summoning orb
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/mLYGXRP.png[/img]
New slayer shop + items 100% working
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tNwAQGP.png[/img]
New reset a skill interface
[IMG]http://img854.imageshack.us/img854/1851/bf1cd7dcea2a421fbc1feba.png[/img]
updated skills tab to add summoning skill
[IMG]http://img23.imageshack.us/img23/1275/1c60eba90fc14bd3b79c034.png[/img]
New pouch creating interface + server sided 100%
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/wSH8LkV.png[/img]
New summoning tab [IMG]http://img838.imageshack.us/img838/6261/51caa014a0664338a3196da.png[/img]
100% BoB! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/GWLqG6l.png[/img]
Dung token shop [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/q2xD0bw.png[/img]
New changepassword interface. (: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/07krh7Z.png[/img]
More places for charms. :D [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/JSX7P10.png[/img]
New boots! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ChS5Fz4.png[/img] [/CENTER]
